features.featureTitle: Remove the “Our Work” / portfolio-gallery section from the Home page by updating only the selected elements that make up the PortfolioPreview section (the section header, subtext, and the portfolio grid/cards) so that the section no longer renders and no empty spacing/gaps remain. Keep all other Home page sections (Hero, tagline, authority section, services overview) intact and unchanged, and ensure the page still flows naturally with consistent headings/spacing and the same authoritative, professional, nationwide tone.
